text: This product is amazing! Love the new features and how intuitive the interface is.
The interface is confusing and needs improvement. I can't find basic functions.
Great customer service, but the app crashes sometimes when uploading large files.
Fast response time and helpful support team. Really appreciate the quick turnaround.
The new update fixed all the bugs I reported. Much more stable now!
Love the dark mode feature! Makes working late much easier on the eyes.
The mobile app is great but the desktop version feels outdated. Needs a refresh.
Excellent performance improvements in the latest release. Loading times are much better.
The documentation is comprehensive and easy to follow. Great job on that!
I wish there was a way to customize the dashboard more. The current layout is too rigid.
